attributes.action: Reduce the power that the Department for transport has in regard to the Railways and Train operating companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long the Train operating companies have been restricted as to what they can do with THEIR Franchises by the DFT. 
For example, restrictions on certain TOC's on the ordering and use of traction and rolling stock have left them with a severe shortage of suitable, safe and reliable rolling stock.
If the Railways are to remain privatised then the private companies need to run it, not some bean counter who has no idea whatsoever on how to run a Railway!
